collection.description: The collection name for result data

metrics.description: The metrics of report. Please see https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/reporting/core/dimsmets (Max. 10 metrics)

dimensions.description: The dimensions of report. Please see https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/reporting/core/dimsmets#segments=true (Max. 5 dimensions)

dimension_filter.description: The dimension filter of report, the format is [metric_name operator values]. Please see https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/reporting/core/dimsmets#segments=true
